name: 2023 6th International Conference on Digital Medicine and Image Processing
content: Paper Publishing 1\. ACM International Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 979-8-4007-0942-5), which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by CPCI. 2\. Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG, ISSN: 2301-3699), which will be included in Scopus, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, IndexCopernicus, etc.
